name: Kindle Paperwhite
description: The Kindle Paperwhite features a 6.8-inch glare-free display with a 300 ppi resolution for crisp text and images. It includes an adjustable warm light for comfortable reading day or night, and the e-ink technology provides a paper-like reading experience. The device is waterproof with IPX8 rating, allowing you to read worry-free at the beach or in the bath. With 8GB of storage, you can store thousands of books, and the battery life lasts up to 10 weeks on a single charge. The device supports wireless charging and includes USB-C fast charging capability. The built-in adjustable light sensors automatically adapt the display brightness to your environment.

name: DJI Mini 3 Pro
description: The DJI Mini 3 Pro is a lightweight drone weighing less than 249 grams, making it regulation-friendly in many regions. It features a 4K camera with a 1/1.3-inch sensor capable of capturing 48MP photos and HDR video. The drone includes tri-directional obstacle sensing for enhanced safety during flight. With up to 34 minutes of flight time and a maximum transmission range of 12km, it offers extended aerial photography sessions. The drone features advanced autonomous flight modes including ActiveTrack for subject tracking and MasterShots for cinematic sequences. It includes a 90-degree rotating gimbal for vertical shooting and supports RAW photo format for professional editing.
